DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate effect deferasirox renal hemodynamics determine glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) , renal plasma flow ( RPF ) filtration fraction ( FF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Examine Effect Deferasirox Renal Hemodynamics β-thalassemia Patients With Transfusional Iron Overload
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female patient ≥ 18 year age without prior history deferasirox treatment βthalassemia patient receive regular transfusion every 25 week Transfusion history ≥ 20 unit pack red blood cell Exclusion criterion : Abnormal renal function baseline ALT great 5 x ULN screen Patients underlie cardiac disease require continuous iron chelation therapy Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
